title: ISic004273. Epitaph of Cassianus erected by his son Cassius
body:
Facsimile Images

Cassius
Cassiano
patri su<o>
fecit

Apparatus criticus

Text according to ILipara 763

English translation

Cassius (set this up) to his father Cassianus.

Italian translation

Cassius (ha eretto questo) per il suo padre Cassianus.

commentary
